nodes.text: Beshel was a Human male who lived on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. He had a shop on the Lower Promenade, where he built and sold armor, as well as armor upgrades and materials.

Beshel was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears as an Armormech crew skill trainer on Nar Shaddaa.
